allowClear.description: Allow the user to clear their input.

autoFocus.description: Autofocus to the block on page load.

oneOf.description: Automatically extend the block number of rows.
Automatically extend the block number of rows, with a set minimum and maximum row amount.

minRows.description: Minimum number of rows the block can be.

maxRows.description: Maximum number of rows the block can be.

autoSize.description: autoSize can either be a boolean value, or an object with minimum and maximum rows.  Defining autoSize disables any prefix or suffix defined.

bordered.description: Whether or not the textarea has a border style.

inputStyle.description: Css style to applied to input.

align.description: Align label left or right when inline.

extra.description: Extra text to display beneath the content - supports html.

hasFeedback.description: Display feedback extra from validation, this does not disable validation.

extraStyle.description: Css style to applied to label extra.

feedbackStyle.description: Css style to applied to label feedback.

maxLength.description: The max number of input characters.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text inside the block before user types input.

rows.description: Number of rows in the block, should be greater or equal to 1. Defining rows disables any prefix.

title.description: Title to describe the input component, if no title is specified the block id is displayed - supports html.

onBlur.description: Trigger action event occurs when text input loses focus.

onChange.description: Trigger action when text input is changed.

onFocus.description: Trigger action when text input gets focus.

onPressEnter.description: Trigger action when enter is pressed while text input is focused.
